sections.heading: of federal Food and Drug Administration; compliance required
sections.text: It is a condition of licensure under the Hearing Instrument Specialists Practice Act that a licensed hearing instrument specialist comply with the rules of the federal Food and Drug Administration governing the ordering of the use, fitting

38-1525.Rules of federal Food and Drug Administration; compliance required.

It is a condition of licensure under the Hearing Instrument Specialists Practice Act that a licensed hearing instrument specialist comply with the rules of the federal Food and Drug Administration governing the ordering of the use, fitting, and sales of hearing instruments as prescribed by 21 C.F.R. 801.422, as such regulations existed on January 1, 2025.

SourceLaws 2025, LB332, ยง 29.Operative Date: September 3, 2025
